description:
“When I was young I got into modeling,” Sheldon told me.
“How’d that go?”
“I did it for a bit,” he said. “It was nice having people tell you how cute you are all the time!”
“Well it’s true,” I said.
Sheldon blushed a bit. He smiled, and his bright blue eyes sparkled.
With his clothes on Sheldon looks skinny. But once his clothes came of I saw that he is nicely toned. I really liked the sprinkling of hair across his chest.
What really caught me by surprise was his cock! I had no idea it would be as large as it is. It’s funny how the skinny, smaller guys always have the biggest dicks!
“Are you a shooter?” I asked.
He seemed surprised by the question, but confident. “Sure am.”
“How big?”
“Well,” he said. “I once blew and hit the ceiling. Straight up the wall and everything!”
Well he wasn’t kidding. When he came he shot such a huge load that he hit my camera. Seriously, it was like a fountain!
“Wow, that was all over the place!” I said as I cleaned the jizz off my camera.
“I told you!” he said. “This happens at home all the time. The ‘aftermath’ takes forever to clean up!”
title: Sheldon
